item.title: A dark and dangerous new chapter for American politics
item.description: The illusion of security and safety in American politics – built over decades - has been dramatically shattered.

item.title: On Donald Trump Rally Shooter's Identity And Motive, FBI Gives An Update
item.description: Security agencies in the US are not yet prepared to identify the shooter behind the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump and will inform the press when they are "100 per cent confident", the FBI said

item.title: "Relieved He's Not Seriously Injured": Kamala Harris On Trump Rally Shooting
item.description: US Vice President Kamala Harris today reacted to the shooting at former president Donald Trump's rally in Pennsylvania and said that "violence such as this has no place in our nation."

item.title: In Pics: How The Shooting At Donald Trump Rally Unfolded
item.description: Former US President Donald Trump was hit in the ear in an apparent assassination attempt by a gunman at a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania today.The gunman and a spectator have been killed and two others critically injured.

item.title: Watch: Video footages show Trump shooter on roof, Secret Services snipers take aim at him
Donald Trump rally shooting: world leaders condemn political violence
item.description:
Presidents and prime ministers have denounced the shooting at a Trump rally in Pennsylvania and wished him a quick recovery

  • Live updates
  • Full report: shooting being investigated at attempt on Trump’s life

Leaders from around the world have condemned the shooting at Donald Trump’s rally in Pennsylvania, denounced political violence and wished Trump a quick recovery.

Trump posted on social media that he had been shot in the upper part of his right ear and that there was “much bleeding.” His campaign said he was “doing well,” and Bloomberg News reported he had been released from the hospital.

Continue reading...
